title: PWV Fund I Investor Gathering
description: Hosted by Jennifer Tacheff, David Price & David Thyresson. We're bringing together a small group of investors, fund-of-funds (FoFs), and family office representatives for an informal gathering with Tom Preston-Werner, David Thyresson (DT), and David Price to discuss PWV Fund I. This is an opportunity to meet the PWV team and ask questions, learn more about Fund I and access the data room, and connect with others who are exploring the fund over thoughtful conversation and refreshments. This is a private, invitation-only event.
